frameworks: Node.js built-in http server (no web framework)
dependencies: node@^16.0.0 (declared in ./package.json; note: this is unusual since Node is typically an engine, not an npm dependency)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application listening on port 3000 (./helloworld.js, ./Dockerfile)
CI/CD pipeline (GitHub Actions) building/pushing Docker image and deploying to ECS (./.github/workflows/workflow.yml)
Amazon ECR (image registry implied by workflow.yml and README)
Amazon ECS (Fargate) service/cluster (implied by workflow.yml and README)
IAM credentials/secrets for deployment (workflow uses AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID/AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY/AWS_REGION secrets)

deployment_relevant_files: ECS_Terra/iam-policy.json (permissions for ECR pull + CloudWatch Logs)
architectural_resources: AWS IAM Role for ECS tasks (trusts ecs-tasks.amazonaws.com)
AWS IAM Policy allowing ECR image pulls and CloudWatch Logs writes (actions in iam-policy.json)
